ModMetaData.description:
Imperial Stormtrooper Marksmanship Academy
"My Legions of Terror will be trained in basic marksmanship. Any [troops] who cannot learn to hit a man-sized target at 10 meters will be used for target practice." — Evil Overlord List, Rule #56
Advance combat AI brought you by the RocketMan Team - Discord: https://discord.gg/Jx8UYNtS24
